name: Smart Mummy
description: Smart Mummy - is a quite difficult 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to pass various levels for the mummy. Your main task in this game is to collect vessels with of bodies for the mummy.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 170 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Core i9 Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 300 MB available space
